INVALID_PAGE_CONTENT: There was a problem. Try going to a different page.
INTERNAL_ERROR_TITLE: Well, this is a bit awkward...
SETTINGS_PROFILES_COMING_SOON: Profiles are coming soon. Stay tuned!
SETTINGS_GENERAL_STARTUP_EXPLANATION: What do you want theWeb to do when it starts?
SETTINGS_GENERAL_HOME_PAGE_EXPLANATION: Where do you want the home button to take you?
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_CLEAR_EXPLANATION: Clear data that theWeb has accumulated as you've been browsing
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_TOGGLES_EXPLANATION: theWeb may automatically connect to some web services to enhance your browsing experience and to provide protection, but you can stop theWeb from doing so if you like.
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_GSB_UNAVAILABLE: We can't warn you if you're about to access a malicious site because theWeb was compiled without Google Safe Browsing support.
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_TOGGLES_DNT: Send a "Do Not Track" request to sites
SETTINGS_PRIVACY_TOGGLES_GSB: Warn me if I'm about to access a malicious site
SETTINGS_ADVANCED_RESET_EXPLANATION: If theWeb isn't working properly or you'd like to start over, you can reset theWeb here.
SETTINGS_ADVANCED_RESET_CONFIRM_CONTENT_: Here's what's going to be cleared:
You can clear these items in the Privacy pane after you're done with this.
This action is irreversible. Once you reset theWeb, there's no going back.

NEWTAB_OBLIVION_EXPLANATION: We'll clear the history (and other related items) for this window once you close it.
